import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; export default function Navigation () { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('/') return (
  • setCurrentPage('/about')} > About Me
  • setCurrentPage('/portfolio')}> Portfolio
  • setCurrentPage('/resume')}> Resume
  • setCurrentPage('/contact')}> Contact
) }
